title: The second set of madrigales to 3. 4. 5. and 6. parts apt both for voyals [sic] and voyces. Newly composed by Iohn Wilbye. 1609.
author: Wilbye, John, 1574-1638.
publisher: Printed by Tho. Este alias Snodham, for Iohn Browne, and are to be sould at his shop in S. Dunstones Churchyard in Fleetstreet,
notes: Six partbooks. At head of title, part 1: "Cantus."; part 2: "Altus."; part 3: "Tenor."; part 4: "Bassus."; part 5: "Quintus."; part 6: "Sextus.".
Signatures: [A]²  B-F⁴; [A]²  B-F⁴; [A]²  B-E⁴; [A]²  B-F⁴; [A]²  B-D⁴; [A]²  B-C⁴.
